name: Exposure (itch) (j4si)
description:
Exposure is a game about the necessity of facing up to unpleasant experiences in order to achieve personal growth. By shining a light on adversity and enduring the confrontation, you gradually work through obstacles and make progress.

TEAM

David Liebemann

Yannick Späder

Ines Hausmann

Patrick Zimmer

Nicolas Biecker

Jörn Friedrichs

Julia Goerke-Milde

Jasmin Kittlitz

CONTROLS

WASD: Move

Left Mouse: Use Flashlight
